cab.content: (P. J 262) From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, ' 26282nd March 1921.(Received 3rd, 8 a.m.)Priority A.298 S. Secret. Afghanistan. Your message received in War Office telegram 88009, dated 26th February.Following from Dobbs, 57 C, 2nd March: " An interview with the Amir was fixed for to-day, at which I was to have made use of my trump card. The meeting has, however, been put off by him in consequence of decease of his paternal grandmother. Until the result of my disclosure has been seen, I shall not be in a position to give my views as regards Djemal."
